com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations

Class PairedReadManager.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations.PairedReadManager.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    PairedReadManager

    public static class PairedReadManager.Builder
extends Object
    Allows for the construction of a PairedReadManager where the data resides on disk instead of in memory. An "on disk" paired read manager is always immutable and whenever it is modified, an in memory version will be created.
    Since:
    API 4.40 (Geneious 5.4.0)

      Creates a new PairedReadManager.Builder

        public PairedReadManager.Builder()

    • Method Detail

      • addSequenceWithMate

        public void addSequenceWithMate(int mateIndex,
                       int expectedDistance)
                         throws DocumentOperationException
        Records the mateIndex and expected distance to the mate for the current sequence in the alignment or list. One call must be made to this method or addSequenceWithoutMate() for each sequence in the alignment or list.
        Parameters:
        mateIndex - the 0-based index of the mate of this sequence
        expectedDistance - the expected distance from the second sequence to its mate. This must not be 0, but may be less than 0 to indicate the mate should be to the left of this sequence
        Throws:
        DocumentOperationException - if we can't write to disk.
        Since:
        API 4.40 (Geneious 5.4.0)

      • addSequenceWithoutMate

        public void addSequenceWithoutMate()
                            throws DocumentOperationException
        Adds a new sequence which doesn't have a mate in this data set.
        Throws:
        DocumentOperationException - if we can't write to disk.
        Since:
        API 4.40 (Geneious 5.4.0)

      • toPairedReadManager

        public PairedReadManager toPairedReadManager()
                                      throws DocumentOperationException
        Creates a new PairedReadManager from this builder. This method may only be called once for a given Builder.
        Returns:
        a new PairedReadManager from this builder.
        Throws:
        DocumentOperationException - if we can't write to disk.
        Since:
        API 4.40 (Geneious 5.4.0)
